column4: there are many 'messenger-clones' or all-in-one clients to connect to msn. Most of them have many more usefull features compared to the original live messenger. However audio/video-chat is 1 thing that every single one lacks.
ok , yahI knew about multi-connect clients,was just wondering how emense or how eve you spell it works with video chats
emesene doesn't have video-chat (yet), but the devs are working on it. There is a nightly build that claims to be able to recieve webcam.
